title: 'Now I won't be able to retire': Woodford investors fear for life savings
text:
Hundreds of thousands of investors have been left fearing for their life savings after the collapse of Britain’s most famous investor’s multi-billion pound fund empire.

Some say they will no longer be able to retire as planned after the Woodford Equity Income fund tanked following its suspension in June. It is now in the process of being wound up.

Many face the added concern that separate nest eggs will suffer the same fate, as trading of the Woodford Income Focus fund has also been suspended.

It follows an announcement from Neil Woodford that he is closing his investment management business for good.

Virginia Jones, 65, put £48,000 of her self-invested pension into the Woodford Equity Income...
description: Hundreds of thousands of investors have been left fearing for their life savings after the collapse of Britain’s most famous investor’s multi-billion pound fund empire.
